com.emc.atmos.api

Class BufferSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.atmos.api.BufferSegment

  • public class BufferSegment
extends java.lang.Object
    A buffer segment is used to select a range of bytes from within an existing byte array.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BufferSegment(byte[] buffer)
      Creates a BufferSegment that specifies the whole byte array (offset=0 and size=buffer.length).
      BufferSegment(byte[] buffer, int offset, int size)
      Creates a new BufferSegment.

                     int offset,
                     int size)
        Creates a new BufferSegment.
        Parameters:
        buffer - the byte array
        offset - starting offset into the byte array in bytes
        size - the number of bytes in the segment
